Package com.undead_pixels.dungeon_bots.scene.entities.actions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    An action that can be performed on an Entity
    ActionGroupings
    A scheme for grouping collections of actions together.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionGroupings.EntityTurnsGrouping
    A mode where only a single entity can move at a time.
    ActionGroupings.RTSGrouping
    A grouping that defines an RTS.
    ActionGroupings.TeamTurnsGrouping
    A grouping that allows each entity on a each team to make one move, one team at a time.
    ActionGroupLock
    A class indicating that actions for a particular group should be locked until completed
    ActionQueue
    A magical queue that keeps track of actions.
    AnimatedAction
    An action that prefers its time in a value increasing from 0 to 1 instead of just delta in time
    SequentialActions
    A list of actions
    SpriteAnimatedAction
    An action that involves animating a sprite
